original_text: They were prostitutes in Egypt, from the time that they were both young women. Men touched their breasts and made love to them.
korean_text: 그들이 애굽에서 행음하되 어렸을 때에 행음하여 그들의 유방이 눌리며 그 처녀의 가슴이 어루만져졌나니

sentences.original_text: from the time that they were both young women
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 두 사람 모두 젊은 여인이었던 시절부터
